body.name: Large Vintage Canvas Messenger Shoulder Bag Travel Crossbody Purse Briefcase Business Bag for 15inch Laptop
features: MATERIAL: high density washed canvas fabric, durable and lightweight:1.12 lbs. Anti-scratchable for longer use.
SIZE:15.7"W x 13.8"H x 5.1"D,comfortably fit a 15" laptop, shoulder strap:46", adjustable. The canvas messenger bag is lightweight, compact, vintage, easy to care for, and functional.

HIGH CAPACITY: Designed with multiple storage compartments and slots: 4 Exterior Pockets: Front Zipper Pocket(fits an Ipad Pro) / Back Zipper Pocket(fits an Ipad Mini) / 2 Side Pockets(fits a thin water bottle/umbrella); 4 Interior Pockets: Front zipper pocket under Flap(4 card slots,3 pen slots,1 phone pouch,1 main pocket) / One main compartment / One protective padded laptop sleeve for 15" / Back zipper pocket

PRACTICAL DESIGN: This canvas messenger bag is large, stylish, and offers you lots of pockets and plenty of room for essentials for gym clothes, laptop, and supplies, or even business essentials. One bag to get all your daily job done.

OCCASION: The vintage style means it would look equally good on men and women. A great bag for your everyday use or to pack for a trip for when you may need a useful bag. Perfect for work, campus, travel, hiking, daily using.

productInformation.value: #52,283 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry) #21 in Messenger Bags

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How To Care For Your Canvas Crossbody Bag? Wash it with clean water at ordinary temperature.DO NOT wash it with hot water and alkaline detergent.Hang to dry and store in ventilated place instead of sun exposure.Wash Separately to avoid staining.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can’t Refuse To Have a Solid Bag
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty awesome messenger bag for the money!The Pros in my opinion:This bag has lots of space. You can virtually fit all your daily essentials in this bag, and more; since it’s not limited to strictly being just a laptop bag. It also has lots of pockets. So if cargo capacity is what you’re after, you won’t be disappointed.The shoulder strap is soft, and approximately 2 inches wide, making the bag comfortable to carry. The strap is also sewn to the bag, giving it a seamless look, and the strap’s length adjusts easily.The canvas the entire bag is made of has some heft to it, and is solidly constructed. It doesn’t feel flimsy, and should be able to keep up with you.The bag’s hardware is pretty solid. The zippers, magnetic closures, buckles, etc. looks like they could hold up well.It’s classic, simple, and versatile style, coupled with its vintage vibe looks really cool. With a good color selection, you shouldn’t have a problem looking for one that tailors to your own personal style.The Cons in my opinion:There is no top handle. So if you ever get tired of carrying the bag on your shoulder, you have to carry it by its strap.Overall, for the price it’s going for, you get a lot for what you pay for. No bells, no whistles. Just a great solid bag to carry what you need, to help get you through your day, ready to go when you are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a classic canvas messenger bag!
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a comfortable and inexpensive bag to carry my laptop in. This is great. It has a classic look AND feel. Right out of the bag It felt properly broken in, which was nice. It is an easy way to carry my laptop, charger, mouse, paperwork and water bottle around. And with such a classic look and feel. While it does have a laptop sleeve, it is not very padded. I put in an additional sleeve so I can bang it around a little in a coffee shop and not worry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this bag.
reviews.reviewText: This is sturdy and hydrophobic. It has plenty of pockets and comfortably fits a 15-in. laptop and about 2 in. of books and paperwork. The color is true to the product photos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for space and style
reviews.reviewText: I originally bought this because it fit my vintage style, and to consolidate and minimize my EDC. It didn’t seem right or appropriate to enter into the music profession with a bulky, old backpack.This bag comfortably fits everything I usually need to function as a professional vocalist. My iPad, Bible, headphones, AUX cord, chargers, flashlight, and a pen fit with ample room and room to even improve on space.It’s a great stylish option if you want to switch to streamlining your EDC or minimize your load with potential to carry more.Needs may vary, but if you’re a professional musician as well as a minimalist, I would say this bag will give a good sense of security.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pockets. Nice size. Straps are sturdy.
reviews.reviewText: This messenger style handbag is great for carrying around lots of stuff - and the larger one even holds my laptop for short trips. Much preferred to a day pack. I use it on day hikes and to carry my lunch and other stuff to work. And when traveling it carries various necessities.I like the magnetic snap to the flaps, though I rarely close it.It has lots of great pockets! It makes things nicely accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The only real change I would make to the bag would be for the front flap to actually buckle to the bag instead of being held by magnets. I'd also like a single handle on the top. Other than that I love the look and utility of the bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a knitter's review
reviews.reviewText: My first day out with the bag was to a friend's for a crafty day. I stopped by the yarn store on my way down. I fit my mini-laptop, my tablet, my project notebook, and six skeins of yarn, plus various pens, knitting needles, and crochet hooks. And I still had room. Bonus: I could reach everything!It has zipper pockets on the back and the outside of the flap. A second zipper section under the flap with partitions for pens and things. Plus pockets. I stuck my new beads and stitch markers there. The interior has a padded pocket for laptops, and a very spacious main space. That main space was where the six skeins of yarn went. If I were to stay at home, I could see it as a yarn holder for a multicolor project.Nice bonus: all the zippers are covered, which means they're protected from the elements as well as wear and tear. Excellent value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought as a gift for a college student, they approve- said it holds a lot and is sturdy without being to heavy- well made and is holding up well so far
Excellent product. My daughter loved it.
